    • writeImage

      public static void writeImage(Image input, algorithms.util.PairIntArray[] edges, algorithms.util.PairIntArray corners, String fileName, int width, int height) throws IOException
      draw the edges over input and mark the corners. The edges are drawn in rotating colors to make it easier to see closed curves. The corners are drawn in red dots of size 2. For best results, the input image should be greyscale.
      Parameters:
      input -
      edges -
      corners -
      fileName -
      width -
      height -
      Throws:
      IOException

      public static void addPointToImage(int x, int y, Image input, int nExtraForDot, int rClr, int gClr, int bClr)
      draw the point over the image using the given rgb colors and the size of the dot beyond 1 pixel.
      Parameters:
      x - of point (NOTE that if the points are from a row major reference frame, you will want to use 'y' here instead).
      y - of point (NOTE that if the points are from a row major reference frame, * you will want to use 'x' here instead).
      input -
      nExtraForDot -
      rClr -
      gClr -
      bClr -
